about_the_game:
Thank you for supporting the development of Survived By! Just like Thorn Equipment grows with your character, we can’t wait to grow Survived By with your help!

- Emoji Set 3
- Family Title: Host of the Bloodthorn
- 2 Unique Attachments: Bloodthorn Parasite & Trail of Thorns
- Thorn Gravestone Cosmetic
- XP Boost Consumable (7 Days) to double XP gain on all characters for a limited time
- Drop Rate Boost Consumable (7 Days) for more chances to get the rarest loot for a limited time
- Crafting Boost Consumable (7 Days) to cut crafting time in half for a limited time
- Choker of Thorns & Circle of Thorns (Includes Lifetime Insurance)
- 1 Additional Character Slot
- 1250 Bloodstone
- 7200 Electrum

name: Survived By - Birthright Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 6600
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Claim your Birthright and support Survived By’s development with the Birthright Supporter Pack! Get rare Thorn gear instantly and give your character a boost. The best part -- it will survive even if your Ancestor doesn’t!
